name: Rubicon 2000
description:
Seal Code: 3711 - 324788 "One of the early Cape Bordeaux royals - now celebrating a quarter century. Regality evident in 2000's deep, polished robe; imposing yet unintimidating vinous m√©lange with cedary decoration. Sleek, agreeably fresh, medium-bodied. Present tannic grip suggests no problem 'losing' this for another 6 years. 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc. 2 years in French oak, 80% new." - Platter's SA Wine Guide 2005, 4.5*

“
Deep purple ink colour. A spicy tobacco leaf and cigar box bouquet. Firm tannins, youthful palate. The wine is well-balanced and has good ageing potential.” - Best in Class Silver - International Wine and Spirits Competition ( IWCS ) 2005
